title: Cannot build Dockerfile
body_html:
Building the docker image fails for me with the below errors.
Any advice?

    Install the project...
    -- Install configuration: "Release"
    -- Installing: /tmp/pip-31nirwmz-build/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib/libTHNN.so.1
    -- Installing: /tmp/pip-31nirwmz-build/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib/libTHNN.so

    -- Installing: /tmp/pip-31nirwmz-build/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN/generic/THNN.h

    -- Checking prototype magma_get_sgeqrf_nb for MAGMA_V2 - True
    -- Compiling with MAGMA support
    -- MAGMA INCLUDE DIRECTORIES: /opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py3.6/include
    -- MAGMA LIBRARIES: /opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py3.6/lib/libmagma.a
    -- MAGMA V2 check: 1
    -- got cuda version 8.0
    -- Found CUDA with FP16 support, compiling with torch.CudaHalfTensor
    -- CUDA_NVCC_FLAGS:  -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I/tmp/pip-31nirwmz-build/torch/lib/tmp_install/include   -I/tmp/pip-31nirwmz-build/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH -I/tmp/pip-31nirwmz-build/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC   -I/tmp/pip-31nirwmz-build/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS -I/tmp/pip-31nirwmz-build/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS   -I/tmp/pip-31nirwmz-build/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THPP -I/tmp/pip-31nirwmz-build/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN   -I/tmp/pip-31nirwmz-build/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN;-Xfatbin -compress-all;-gencode;arch=compute_35,code=sm_35;-gencode;arch=compute_52,code=sm_52;-gencode;arch=compute_60,code=sm_60;-gencode;arch=compute_61,code=sm_61;-gencode;arch=compute_61,code=compute_61;-DCUDA_HAS_FP16=1
